website_summaries.verdict: All-natural product contains tea tree oil, so there are no harsh chemicals.
pros: Comb easily removes lice and nits
We like that it has a cap to keep treatment on the scalp only
The majority of purchasers were pleased with the effectiveness of this product
Lice-elimination kit consisting of spray made with tea tree oil, protective cap for head, and comb
cons: There were complaints from some buyers about the quality and effectiveness of the nit comb

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a Kit but I only got the spray .. I am very disappointed.. In the picture it shows a plastic cap and a lice comb. I wasn’t expecting to pay $16 for just a spray. When I tried to return it the link was unavailable and stated no returns allowed
customer_reviews.author: Mari D

customer_reviews.title: ... cover break outs and its been one of the best I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is used by a school nurse told me about this product and I decided I wanted some to use to cover break outs and its been one of the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: scott weber

customer_reviews.title: The tweezers and brush are a good idea but they are so cheaply made that they ...
customer_reviews.text: the different size interchangeable metal bristle attachments are so hard to put in and take out that I had to use pliers and after the second time trying to pull the short bristle attachment out one of the hooks that holds it in place snapped off. Not only that several times while combing my hair I can hear the plastic cracking as I pull the comb through. The tweezers and brush are a good idea but they are so cheaply made that they do little if any good.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Okabayashi

customer_reviews.title: She was very happy to have something that worked on her kids
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my missionary friend in Greece. She was very happy to have something that worked on her kids. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: amelia scriven

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work quite as well as I expected from other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Works the first time you use it! !!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Aldapa

customer_reviews.title: Lice Cure does not kill the lice!
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that Lice Cure would kill the lice... but it doesn't. When the package arrives.. the directions actually state that the sole purpose is to loosen the nits from the hair shaft so you can comb them out easily.. and then eventually.. you won't have any more lice because you've combed out all of the nits. So, there is no killing of the lice that are already alive.
customer_reviews.author: hike4ever

customer_reviews.title: It had a horrible chemical smell that I could not get rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not comb through my hair with comb or brush, even after using conditioner. It had a horrible chemical smell that I could not get rid of for days, even by washing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: JinxSpeed

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: There are two different length combs with this handle. The combs are very hard to snap into place on the handle. The first time I tried to put the larger comb in, the little plastic piece that holds it in place broke off so it is unusable with the handle. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Racquetqueen

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Never will I buy store bought again. This stuff is magic.
customer_reviews.author: Amy belello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is safe to use more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love this product! It worked great the first time we used it! !!
customer_reviews.author: Debra J.

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE TODAY !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does an amazing job ! It will get eggs and lice out. You will see a BIG difference in the hair after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: Ezy Dose Kids Lice and Eggs Comb and Removal Kit | Hair Care for Baby, Toddler, Adult | Tea Tree Oil Spray Bottle
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS: Long-pin comb for nits, designed for maximum effectiveness by removing multiple nits with every pass through the hair
INCLUDES: Long-pin comb, Tea Tree Spray, Protective Cap
BUILT TO LAST: Quality design, Built to withstand repeated use
HEALTHY LIVING: Ezy Dose products make living healthier simply easier, Many products endorsed by the Arthritis Foundation
